history.proof: intros d a sigma H. split. - intros [s Hs]. apply prec_list_ind. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: dt_kill_empty_r, reconnaissance, dt_kill_empty_d. + hauto use: dt_kill_empty_kill_empty_3, dt_kill_empty_r. + sfirstorder depth: 3use: dt_kill_empty_r, reconnaissance, dt_kill_empty_d. - intros [t Ht]. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: dt_kill_empty_r, reconnaissance, dt_kill_empty_d.

exceptions.tactic: destruct (dt_kill_empty_r d a s Hs) as [t Ht].
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma s : state Hs : MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a = Some s The term "s" has type "state" while it is expected to have type "term".
The reference t was not found in the current environment.
Cannot coerce reconnaissance to an evaluable reference.
The reference Ht was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: destruct (dt_kill_empty_d d a t H) as [s Hs].
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma t : term Ht : reconnaissance d a t The term "H" has type "predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma" while it is expected to have type "reconnaissance d a t".
The reference s was not found in the current environment.
Cannot coerce reconnaissance to an evaluable reference.

In environment d : preDTA a : ad sigma : signature H : predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma t : term Ht : reconnaissance d a t Unable to unify "reconnaissance d a t" with "exists s : state, MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states d) d) a = Some s".

original: intros d a sigma H. split. - intros [s Hs]. destruct (dt_kill_empty_r d a s Hs) as [t Ht]. exists t. unfold reconnaissance. apply Ht. - intros [t Ht]. destruct (dt_kill_empty_d d a t H) as [s Hs]. exists s. unfold reconnaissance in Ht. apply Ht.
